bug.author: pelillian
bug.summary: Express Installation does not work as described in the docs
bug.description: Express installation does not work. This is very important if we want other groups to start using garage! The scripts should just work without any user intervention. Mujoco installation (& others?) should be disabled by default.

comments.comment: Can you please provide the error message on installation? Also is it for linux or mac?

I look forward to a short PR updating the docs. AFAIK setup_linux.sh and setup_osx.sh already work unattended if given the write command line args. IMO MuJoCo should be included by default because it is required for many examples. Not requiring MuJoCo doubles the number of system configurations we need to support and test, unnecessarily. Half-initialized systems are incredibly difficult to write and test code for. That's why all dependencies are required, even if some people don't necessarily need them. I'll trade a couple GB of hard disk space for stability and predictability any day.

Can you please provide the error message on installation? Also is it for linux or mac?
